Log.short_help: Writes a message to the Render Log

SaveRenderNodeList.short_help: Saves the current list of RenderNodes
SaveRenderNodeList.description:
Arguments:
   filename - The file to save to (defaults to Queues:Slaves.slv)

LoadRenderNodeList.short_help: Loads a list of RenderNodes to use
LoadRenderNodeList.description:
Arguments:
   filename - The file to load from (defaults to Queues:Slaves.slv)

ScanForRenderNodes.short_help: Scans local network for new RenderNodes

AddRenderNode.short_help: Adds a RenderNode to the node list
AddRenderNode.description:
Arguments:
   Name   - the node's hostname or IP address
   Groups - (optional) the render groups to join (default "all")
   Unused - (optional) node will be added, but not used

RemoveRenderNode.short_help: Removes a RenderNode from the node list
RemoveRenderNode.description:
Arguments:
   node  - the node object, or its hostname or IP address

RemoveJob.short_help: Removes a job from the list

MoveJob.short_help: Moves a job up or down the list
MoveJob.description:
Arguments:
    job    - the RenderJob to move
    offset - how far up or down the job list to move it
             (negative offsets move the job up)

AddJob.short_help: Adds a job to the list
AddJob.description:
Arguments:
	Filename	Filename of comp or script to be queued
	Groups		RenderNode groups to assign the job to
	FrameRange	Range of frames to render
	EndScript	Script file to execute on completion
	Args		Table of named options, including:
			Filename, Groups, FrameRange, EndScript
			Start, End, QueuedBy, RenderStep, TimeOut

SaveQueue.short_help: Saves the current list of jobs

LoadQueue.short_help: Loads a list of jobs to do

GetGroupList.short_help: Get a list of all node groups

GetJobList.short_help: Get the list of jobs to render

GetRenderNodeList.short_help: Get the list of available RenderNodes
